activities:
INFORMATION COLLECTION AND USE
IdeaScale provides its web-based Services to support innovation, facilitate dialogue, and to collect  ideas and feedback for use by IdeaScale customers. 
Registration Information:  In order to use the Services, you must first complete a registration form and create a username and password.  During registration, you are required to give your name and email address.  Additionally, an IdeaScale customer may upload email addresses to the Services for the purpose of inviting the address owners to customer’s IdeaScale community.  
Billing Information:If you purchase a service from IdeaScale, you must provide your contact information (such as name and billing address) and financial information (such as credit card number and expiration date).  IdeaScale encrypts all credit card information.  IdeaScale will use this information to contact you if there are any issues while processing the order.  
Profile Information:  IdeaScale stores information that it collects through user input, cookies, log files, and user forms to create a user profile.  Depending on your specific use of the Services, a profile may include the following:
Registration Information--depending on how IdeaScale customers decide to use the Services, this may include, for example, any of the following: username, password, first name, last name, email address, and phone number; and
Preferences--profile selections, such as language preference, that determine the specific way you want IdeaScale Services delivered to you.
Community Information:  In private communities, idea submissions, comments, and usernames are only viewable by members of the private community.  In order to enter a community, a member must log in with his or her proper credentials.  In private communities, idea submissions, comments, and usernames are viewable by the public at large.  
THIRD PARTIES:IdeaScale does not share personally identifiable information with third parties except as follows:
 To Provide Requested Partner Services.  If you specifically request a service from one of our partnering companies, your personally identifiable information will be shared with the applicable partnering company.
To Provide Chat Services.  IdeaScale uses the third-party tool LiveChat to host chat support.  When you request live chat support, your contact information will be stored by LiveChat as necessary to provide chat support.  LiveChat is prohibited from using your personally identifiable information for any other purpose.
To Provide Support Tickets.  IdeaScale also uses the third-party tool Desk to host customer support tickets.  When you raise a support ticket, your contact information will be stored by Desk as necessary to provide support services.  Desk is prohibited from using your personally identifiable information for any other purpose.  
 To Process Credit Card Payments.  IdeaScale uses outside credit card processing companies to process your credit card payments.  These companies do not retain, share, store or use personally identifiable information for any other purposes.
To Comply with Law.  IdeaScale reserves the right to disclose your personally identifiable information as required by law and when it believes that disclosure is necessary to protect its rights and/or to comply with a judicial proceeding, court order, or legal process.

personaldata: Online client and market research participant data provided and collected by client, manually and automatically processed.
